Crushed red coral fills the form, a vivid contrast to the pale multi-colored shells which form the rest of the street. The design is repeated at regular intervals along the road, identifying the street name for travelers.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Aeliy Ushiaena'a
node.description: The air is sharp with the tang of heated metal wafting into the street from a low building nearby. Unlike most buildings on the island, this one is composed of heavy slabs of creamy sandstone, and the rhythmic ring of hammer on metal echoes about the area. The sign above the door bears the image of a silver-edged sword, identifying this as the local weapon shop.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Aeliy Ushiaena'a
node.description: A wooden shed nestles against the cool white sandstone walls of the local armory. Bronze hardware accents the door, the knocker and doorknob adorned with an intricately engraved lion's head. A narrow path of pale yellow crushed seashells leads up to the building, bordered by dark green holly bushes with bright red berries.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Aeliy Ushiaena'a
node.description: Smoke billows into the sky from a soot-streaked white sandstone chimney on a low building near the road. The sign on the door identifies this as Martrem's Forge, the local armory. A rhythmic pounding of hammer on metal, and an occasional curse accompanied by a dull thud of metal on flesh, reverberates through the open door.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Aeliy Ushiaena'a
node.description: A low copse of rowan trees grows in the courtyard of a nearby home. The scalloped picket gate separates the courtyard from the street, though a clever arrangement of counterweights allow the gates to slide aside to permit visitors to enter. White wrought iron benches surround the trees, sheltered by the leafy branches.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Staho Pivo'hrr'schu'Mus
node.description: Standing amidst a grove of white birch trees is the island's general store. A very plain building, its paper screen walls are decorated with images of pots and needles. Many of the stone columns supporting its tile roof have been chiseled into shelves to hold samples of the proprietor's wares.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Staho Pivo'hrr'schu'Mus
node.description: Gleaming like a pearl on blue velvet in the light, the thick cloud surrounding Eluned's temple stretches out thin tendrils of mist onto the Liva'an Chawalkas. A long flight of basalt steps leads down to the terrace surrounding the lake.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Staho Pivo'hrr'schu'Mus
node.description: The street of crushed red and white shells winds between several houses along the road, each with its own gated courtyard. A gleaming anloral hand, palm facing the sky, rises from the middle of the street. Growing from the palm is a long silverleaf vine.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Staho Pivo'hrr'schu'Mus
node.description: An imposing flight of basalt stairs rises high above, leading to the next terrace. Delicate music arises from the crystal and brass windchimes hung from a nearby house.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Outside the Necropolis
node.description: The trail of crushed shells ends at an elegant white wrought-iron gate marking the entrance to the island's cemetery. A bridge spanning a small pond of deep blue water, visible through the bars of the gate, lies not far beyond it.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Gate
node.description: Water shimmers as the moonlight plays off the surface of a small pond just within the cemetery gates. A wooden bridge with ornamental railings provides safe passage across the water. The branches of the weeping willows bordering the pond sway gracefully in the current as the rhythmic chirps of crickets echo through the still night air.

Water sparkles as the sun plays off the surface of a small pond just within the cemetery gates. A wooden bridge with ornamental railings provides safe passage across the water. The branches of the weeping willows bordering the pond tremble gracefully beneath the weight of small birds that make their home here, while fish rise to the surface to nibble on the pale green leaves which trail along the water.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, On the Bridge
node.description: The bridge arcs high above the pond, providing an excellent view of the outer cemetery. Below, the pond water is almost crystal clear, clear enough to view the fish swimming within. A row of majestic oak trees line either side of the trail that leads deeper into the cemetery, while a bed of freshly planted daisies and daffodils line the path back to the gate.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis
node.description: The trail ends at the base of a short stairway leading up to the main cemetery. Massive granite gargoyles perch atop marble pedestals at the base of the stair, their lifeless eyes gazing impassively around the area. Marigolds grow in clay pots on each step, providing a splash of color against the white marble stairs. At the top of the stairs, a few headstones are barely visible on the hillside.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Ishh's Used Goods
node.description: White birch shelves, piled high with used weapons and armor, line the walls. Ishh stands behind a counter of mottled marble stone. An obsidian plaque shaped like a flying raven hangs over the door leading out.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, A Courtyard
node.description: The wrought iron gate separates the courtyard from the street, but allows an open view of the surrounding landscape. The fountain in the center burbles a soothing tone in the night air as its water spills into the marble basin. A single bench rests beneath the overhanging roof of the home.

node.name: Joirin's Puzzles
node.description: Colorful baskets painted in every shade of the rainbow hang from the rafters, holding wood and other supplies for the puzzle maker. The wicker and rattan containers provide a sharp contrast to the stark white paper walls of the shop itself. A gilt-edged black leather catalog rests atop a fringed red silk shawl which has been draped over the counter.

node.name: Joirin's Puzzle Shop, Back Room
node.description: Several halfling children, each seated at a small table, labor industriously to build the puzzles their father sells in his shop. An older woman walks among the children, helping them with the more difficult parts. A large sign hangs on the wall opposite the wooden door leading out.

node.name: Bayanzi Gherkrish and Sons, Cordwainers
node.description: Shadows fill the corners of the dimly lit workshop. The walls, once a pale shade of cream, are speckled with various colors from the leatherworker's dyes, while the relatively dust-free state of the floor seems due more to the presence of several cats wandering about than any use of a broom. Piles of leather and oddly-shaped wooden forms are stacked on shelves along the back wall, while near the window the cordwainer sits on a stool, hunched over his current project.

node.name: Field of Shields
node.description: Shields of all shapes and sizes line the walls. Some are nicked and scarred from years of use -- trophies of war. Others are bright and clean -- trophies of art. The cool night air drifts in through the windows, carrying with it the gentle sounds of water from the distant lake. An alert Elven clerk smiles politely as he directs entering customers toward the various displays.

Shields of all shapes and sizes line the walls. Some are nicked and scarred from years of use -- trophies of war. Others are bright and clean -- trophies of art. Daylight streams through the wide open windows, brightly illuminating the shop. A sleepy S'Kra Mur clerk smiles politely as he directs entering customers toward the various displays.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Willow Park
node.description: The sound of crickets and frogs engaging in their nightly chorus echoes across the still waters of the pond. A narrow white gravel path is bathed by the moonlight, like a pearl necklace surrounding the velvety dark waters. The children who enliven the park by day have long since found their beds, leaving the night to young lovers who sit on wrought iron benches, exchanging kisses as they talk.

node.name: Kilora's Weaponry
node.description: Streaks of soot mar the cream-colored sandstone walls of the weaponsmith's workshop. In the center of the room, a complex arrangement of wood and leather is connected to a set of beehive forges arranged in a cluster. Beside each forge, a journeyman works at an anvil, crafting blades beneath the watchful eye of Master Smith Kilora Azmuthar.

node.name: Brightwings' Engravings
node.description: A menu board listing the available patterns hangs from the shelf of a workbench which divides the front of the shed from the living area. Behind it, flames flicker in a white sandstone fireplace. A litter of puppies clusters around their mother on the hearthrug, their soft mewling cries barely audible above the crackle of burning wood.

node.name: Martrem's Forge and Armory
node.description: The air is filled with the raucous din of apprentices' hammers striking the anvils about the forge. Near the fire, a soot-streaked urchin labors over the leather bellows to fan the flames. Supervising the confusion is a burly Gor'Tog smith who paces tirelessly about the room.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, A Courtyard
node.description: Young, graceful rowan trees shelter the benches that encircle the copse at the center of the courtyard. A few fallen leaves flutter over the damp soil, awaiting a gardener's rake. The sweet scent of rich earth and fragrant trees greets each breath, and the lull of breeze-blown branches softens the sounds beyond the picket gate.

node.name: Elver Rummeltum's Home and Garden Supplies
node.note: Elver Rummeltum's Home and Garden Supplies|General Store
node.description: Baskets and plants fill the shelves of the general store, with even more sitting on a workbench off to one side. The aroma of roasting meats and fresh-baked bread wafts through the open doorway of the catering shop, mingling with the fragrance of flowers grown by the pudgy Halfling shopkeeper who stands behind the counter.

node.name: Erianthe's Flowers
node.description: Stoneware pots and wicker baskets scattered throughout the shop hold fresh flowers, their delicate petals filling the room with a heady fragrance. Glass vials stacked on the window sill are used to extract the essential oils from herbs and flowers to make perfume. A sun-bleached workbench near the window holds an open catalog, as well as an assortment of wire and thread, and a half-completed etrana blossom wreath.

node.name: Erianthe's Flowers, Spring Room
node.description: The grey stone floor vibrates slightly underfoot, and the sound of running water burbles through a metal grate in the far corner. Quite a bit cooler than the rest of the shop, the walls of the spring room are lined with grey stone shelves on which elaborate flower arrangements are displayed in stoneware vases.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Staho Pivo'hrr'schu'Mus
node.description: The northern crescents of the city are visible from this vantage point several hundred feet above the lake. Ending abruptly at a flight of basalt stairs, a pathway of crushed red and white shells curves around an ancient oak tree.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Staho Pivo'hrr'schu'Mus
node.description: Curving around a circle of stones, the path of crushed shells leads east to the southern crescent of the city. Within the circle, a patient artist has created a portrait of colored sands.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: Iridescent flecks of sparkling quartz crystals mingle with crushed ivory seashells which pave the southern crescent of the town. A low hedge of fragrant k'dira bushes lines the street, the faint aroma of its leaves identifying the plant, even in the darkness.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: A horn plays the quick, stacatto notes of a march, the melody floating through the air from a nearby shop. The heavy paper walls of the shop are painted with a faint white-on-white pattern of songbirds, complementing the carved leaves which embellish the black stone pillars. A brass sign is inlaid on the pillar beside the entrance.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: The open courtyards of nearby homes provide their owners a splendid view of the town overlooking the mist-shrouded lake at the center. Each courtyard is a peaceful oasis of tranquility amidst the bustle of daily life.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: Hundreds of sparkling crystal prisms hang from the branches of cherry trees which grow in neat, if closely spaced, rows beside the road. Each crystal chimes softly as it brushes against each other, creating a complex mix of light, aroma and music which changes with each breath of wind.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: Light streams from the windows which border nearby courtyards, illuminating the topiary which is scattered throughout the grass. From the road, you can see a boxwood mermaid seated amidst lifesculpted birch tree waves.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: Young men and women clad in silken tunics and colorful leggings gather at tables arrayed on the wrought iron balconies which overlook the flower-filled courtyard in a nearby school. The sound of adolescent laughter floats though the air as they work together to practice their lines for an upcoming play.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: Water sparkles in the light from a nearby home as it tumbles into the tiered crystal basins of a fountain. Surmounting the structure is a statue of a young Elven woman with long hair and a patient expression listening to a youngster playing a golden flute. Crystal phoenixes rise from each basin, filling the night with music as the water splashes against their upstretched wings.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: Golden blossoms grow in clusters on lyrandia vines which twine their deep green tendrils along the rails of a whitewashed wooden fence which stands beside the road. The skillful hand of the gardener who tends them keeps the flowers in bloom year round, filling the air with a subtle sweet aroma.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: Local residents gather on balconies facing their courtyards to enjoy jasmine tea and the company of friends. Brightly colored ceramic roof guardians sculpted to depict various beasts, both real and imaginary, look out from the edges of the tiled roofs, keeping a watchful eye on all who pass.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: A vibrant red-enameled wrought iron fence embellished with fanciful images of gilded harps and sleeping black dragons borders the road. Crystals dangle between the risers of the fence, sparkling in the light and filling the air with music when brushed by the gentle touch of the wind.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: An iridescent mix of quartz and crushed seashells crunches underfoot as travelers make their way past the homes which line the quiet street. Elaborately carved black stone pillars support heavy white paper screens painted with faint scenes of merfolk at play.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: Crimson blossoms dangle from the branches of a sharktooth tree, like drops of blood dripping from the pale grey bark. The tree stands within the courtyard of a nearby home, surrounded by low shrubbery lifesculpted into fanciful fish shapes. Maiden's Tress vines dangle from the branches of other trees in the courtyard, swaying in the wind like seaweed caught in an underwater current.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: Seashells crunch beneath sandaled feet as residents make their way along the street. Metal forms in the shape of musical notes inlaid along the edges of the roadbed hold crushed red coral. Faint images of dolphins dart in and out amidst the notes.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Jama
node.description: Crystal wind chimes dangle from tall poles and trees along the length of the street. Their soft music mingles with the wind to identify the road to strangers and provide a comforting sense of home to local residents. Sparkling flecks of quartz crystals are mixed with crushed shells to pave the crescent.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Staho Lanahh'Mus
node.description: The white and pink shells of the staho curve westward to join the chui'mysanda jama. Many of the houses in this southeasternmost corner of the city are built within a grove of trees, rather than alongside the street. A statue of an Elven woman stands beside the road, her head turned towards the trees.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Staho Lanahh'Mus
node.description: Shrouded by a cloak of mist, the Temple of Eluned rests on the island in the center of the lake. Lush forests of white birch, silverwood, and willow can be seen through the gaps between the houses. The crushed white and rose shells of the pathway continue running south from a flight of basalt stairs.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: The path winds upwards towards the green meadows and farm fields, a low stone wall beside it piled with the stray rocks and boulders removed from the pastures. Quilted crofts stretch upwards, nearly a third of the distance to the rim of Surlaenis, each a piece of patchwork over the southern slopes. Downhill, the path merges into the trees and ondjai of the encircling streets of the city.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: An unrepaired gap in the bordering walls reveals the spilling grass, blown in ripples by the wind. Sheep graze across it, flecks of white and dark rising from the lushness. The grass sprouts a goodly share of thistle and milkweed near one of the less cared for crofts.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: The steeply slanted hillside undulates with rippling grass and uneven ground, neat stone walls parceling the cottages and crofts. A bosky grove down the hill shelters a few dwellings clustered in the hollow. A lit lantern or candle peeps through an unshuttered window like a star in the darkness.

The steeply slanted hillside undulates with rippling grass and uneven ground, neat stone walls parceling the cottages and crofts. A bosky grove down the hill shelters a few dwellings clustered in the hollow. In the distance the pale mist of Cha'walkas rises, and the faint outline of the temple steeple emerges in the gap of the trees.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: To the south, the meadow rises steeply, the grass clinging to rock-strewn soil in dark patches. A winding path leads up to a solitary cottage.
To the south, the meadow rises steeply, the grass clinging to rock-strewn soil, and the sturdy sheep foraging for the lushest fodder. A winding path leads up to a solitary cottage.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: Soft swells in the relatively flat terracing make excellent farmland here, overlooking the lough and encircling streets of the city down to the north. The narrow path runs east and west, where several white-washed cottages aligned in a row face down the hill towards the center of the island.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: For a great distance there is nothing but meadowland, terraced fields dotted with wildflowers within the grass. No animals graze here, only the wind sweeping across, brushing the unmown verdure into a flutter of rippling waves.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: The stone walls bordering the path are stained a saffron yellow from the lichen that grows upon the stone. A field mouse nest, wedged against the bottom of the wall, is uninhabited at the moment.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: A wooden bridge crosses a stream pouring down the slope from the melting snows high at the rim. The water races through the boulders and gathers speed as it plummets down the slope. Little waterfalls drop the runnel over the edge before it swirls through the grass to drop again and again, tumbling musically to the lake below.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: To the west, the path continues over a small wooden bridge that spans a stream of melted snow and runoff. Further east, the path begins a slow, gentle curve to the north as it runs along the ridge of the terraced meadowland. An occasional stone cottage or small tree breaks the rhythm of mounded stone walls and steep hillside.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: The dwelling of a small farmstead stands upon a flattened bump on the hillside, a flower pot with herbs at the door. The ground behind the cottage is rocky and perilously steep, a dark face on the blackest nights. The lights of the buildings encircling Cha'walkas lake are visible through a persistent evening fog, fluttering through the veil of trees and cloud below.

The dwelling of a small farmstead stands upon a flattened bump on the hillside, a flower pot with herbs at the door. The ground behind the cottage is rocky and perilously steep, but the white flecks upon it are a few intrepid sheep that somehow manage to make their way to browse on the persistent grass. A zig-zagging path climbs back to the road below.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: The hillside drops precariously to the north, with only the bordering stone wall preserving the traveler from a plummet to rocks and trees far below. A willow tree arches over the path, some of its branches cracked and broken. A flat stone leans against the tree.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: The lane climbs sharply upwards towards the next terrace, with green meadowlands rising above it. The ground is studded with chunks of rock, and the walls bordering the path are made from the same fieldstone cleared from the pastures. On clear days you can see the stark white rim of the island above to the south, and the rising mists of Lake Cha'walkas down to the northwest.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: At the end of the steep path is a fieldstone cottage and its adjoining stone barn, the doors to each painted a rusty red color. Smoke curls from the chimney of the cot and the yard is littered with woodchips from chopped firewood or crafters' work.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Marscern's Cottages and Building Supplies
node.description: Samples of stone and roofing materials are displayed for the customer to choose a preference. The earthen floor is packed hard, and a pleasant, homey smell of straw and baking bread wafts through the open doorway that leads to the resident's cottage.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Marscern's Cottage Interiors
node.description: More samples of stone lie stacked in rows along the straw-strewn earthen floor, and different paneling materials are displayed along one wall of the barn. Rustling sounds of a bird nesting and stirring come from a high gabled window overhead. Marscern's younger brother, Mercelt, sits nearby ready to assist customers with their questions.

node.name: Treywood Cottage Crafters
node.description: White plaster walls make the cluttered entrance hall seem slightly less crowded, though no paint can disguise the piles of dry lumber stacked in bins along the back wall. The sweet scent of sandalwood mingles with the spicy smell of cedar and the sharp tang of varnish and lacquer as the craftsmen who share this cottage ply their trade.

node.name: Chidwycke's Chairs
node.description: Chairs, stools, benches and armchairs are clustered in conversational groupings around low tables in the shop. From lightweight wicker to carved sandalwood, the shop offers a variety of seats to suit every taste. A sign on the wall encourages potential buyers to examine each chair carefully to appreciate the fine workmanship.

node.name: Hibernations
node.description: The walls of the shop are painted a pale ivory, stenciled with a waist-high border of ivy vines. A deep blue floral carpet cushions the floor as customers peruse the selection of beds and daybeds offered by the shopkeeper at Hibernations. A small sign advises potential buyers to examine each piece carefully before making their decision.

node.name: Tyngle's Tables
node.description: Tables and desks are scattered around the shop, from heavy, dark oak refectory tables to light weight black lacquer parson's tables. The walls have been painted a neutral shade of ivory, and a thick wool carpet in a vibrant floral design covers the floor. A nearby sign advises customers to examine the workmanship of each piece before making their decision.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, A Courtyard
node.description: An uncommon tree, known as the sharktooth tree, shelters the overhanging roofs of the homes facing the courtyard. Unusual specimens are prominent here, as lifesculpted shrubbery borders the walls of one ondjai, and maiden's tress vines dangle from two small trees that guard the entry to another. Radiating paths connect the homes at the center -- an oval shell-paved contemplation area features a small shrub, just beginning its lifesculpted transformation to the shape of a leaping fish.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, A Courtyard
node.description: A cherry tree stands like a dancer poised to move with the first note of music. The ground beneath is cobbled with octagonal stones, tufts of grass sprouting neatly in the cracks. A single bench beneath the tree faces the ondjai entry screen, its back turned to the courtyard gate.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, A Courtyard
node.description: Within the courtyard, a vision of brilliant red, green and yellow colors greets the eye. Yellow buttercups dot the mown lawn underfoot, and red-lacquered garden benches echo the hue and design of the surrounding fence -- each carved with a dragon or harp upon its back. The crystals dangling between the fence risers sparkle and gently chime with each gust of wind or swing of the gate.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, A Courtyard
node.description: A large courtyard is a gathering place for several residences that surround it on three sides. A gate separates it from the nearby road. Benches with backs and arms, shaded by a row of birch trees, provide the residents an outdoor sitting room. In the center of the area, a small fountain chuckles softly as water spills from the pipes that feed it.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, A Courtyard
node.description: Lyrandia vines with deep green tendrils and aromatic, golden flowers twine along the fence and gate that marks the entrance to this courtyard. The grass is crisscrossed by dirt paths and heavily shaded by a lone hemlock. A group of boulders rest near the tree, arranged in a loose triangle.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chui'mysanda Shyrel'nor Fundisoli
node.description: Lush rose bushes fill the air with a heady fragrance in the garden at the center of the school's courtyard. Young men and women of good families stroll the soft mulched pathways, accompanied by stern duennas to chaperone their behaviour. A mischievous young man gives you a wink from his perch atop the garden wall.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, A Courtyard
node.description: A black slate walkway surrounds an area of boxwood greenery. In the center of the courtyard, silvery flashes of light sparkle amidst the reflected greenery as slender fish rise to the surface of a pebbled pool. Black benches symmetrically placed on three sides of the harti face the center.

node.name: Teshi's Instruments
node.description: Toys lie scattered about the slightly dusty wooden floor, and an old cradle rocks silently in the corner. The walls of the shop are lined with cabinets painted with colorful songbirds. An old pine workbench stands against the far wall, supporting a half-finished rebec held in place with an assortment of vices. A chalk-stained leather catalog rests atop the workbench.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, High Meadow
node.description: A crumbling slate cliff drops away sharply below, but a narrow ribbon of pasture land stretches to the northeast and southwest. Strange scraggly shrubs sprout intermittently among the grasses, as if the wilderness still hopes to reclaim the meadow for itself.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, High Meadow
node.description: To the northeast, a collapsed segment of the cliff has cut off passage any further in that direction. The grass is particularly lush here as though this corner were better protected from harsh winds and winter cold.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands
node.description: Although the meadowland is rich here, it is but a thin stripe between the abrupt drop below to the north and the opposing steep incline reaching overhead to the south. A few simple cottages nestle against the black cliffs where the land is the rockiest and the grass cannot quite take grip.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands
node.description: Passage west is only by traversing a narrow ledge of ground. As the drop to the meadowlands below is plummeting, the way is not one for the inattentive. Some enterprising soul has attempted to build a rough guardrail of sorts, but the occasional stones raining down from the black cliffs above have knocked whole sections completely down.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highland Ledge
node.description: Water seeps in a thready trickle from a crack in the rock, dribbling swiftly away to join the stream gushing from a larger hole below the path. The rocky ledge extends east and west to meadows tucked beneath steep cliff walls.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands
node.description: A startlingly rich meadow serves as a common for the roaming sheep. Cottages with tidy roofs and small flower gardens dot the perimeter -- they are nothing fancy, but obviously kept with pride.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands
node.description: Five cottages arranged in a wheel shape crowd a stony area between the meadow and a yawning cave. In the darkness, the black stone dwarfs the shelters, and the warm light of candles and fires visible from the homes shines brightly against the dark cavity.

Five cottages arranged in a wheel shape crowd a stony area between the meadow and a yawning cave. The maw in the black stone precipice dwarfs the shelters, creating a dark backdrop to the bright shutters and cheerful flowers planted along the pathway.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands
node.description: Backed against the cliff, several carefully kept cottages face the nearby meadow, each with a neat walkway that radiates like a finger of a splayed hand. A cairn of stones stands at the intersection of the paths.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands
node.description: The rising cliffs to the south overhang several tidy cottages tucked under their shelter. Flimsy willow fences surround a small garden tended by the inhabitants of the area. Unless a rock breaks loose and tumbles down upon the hapless cots, this is a pleasant place to dwell, with the grassy lea visible northwards.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands
node.description: The last stretch of grassland ends as the bluffs fall away to meadows far below, or rise straight up to the upper reaches of the island's bowl. The ruins of a building have been overgrown by the grass and shrubs, but a tower with a conical slate roof still stands at the very edge of the drop-off.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Narrow Ledge
node.description: Carved by nature out of the black basalt of the island, the narrow ledge provides a breathtaking view of the city spreading down the hillside below you. Trees and meadows give way to solid buildings and streets, ending in the misty lake cupped in the bottom of the bowl, with the city rising on all sides around it. A narrow trail leads up and southward.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands Stream
node.description: A dark hole just under the surface of the pooling stream releases a flood of water from beneath the cliff wall. The temperature is just warm enough to keep it liquid, but it is always icy cold, summer and winter. Rocky walls on one side lead back up to the ledge. On the other side, nothing is visible but the tops of shrubs and stunted trees that cling to the sheer slopes.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands Stream
node.description: Here the waters are the calmest, just before dropping over a small lip to a pool of rough currents below. The tone of the rapids is high in pitch, and the sheer wall on the northern side reverberates in an echo of pleasant harmony in a song without words.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands Stream
node.description: The deep rapids churn the water collecting in this hollowed basin before continuing down the precipitous slopes. Trailing vegetation dangles in the water and holds back many of the shards of rock that often rain down from the cliffs above.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands Stream
node.description: The stream gathers force as the banks narrow and channel the rushing water down towards the distant lake below. Sharp rocks jut into the water and occasional plops disturb the surface as frogs and other creatures venture from shore to stream.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands Stream
node.description: High black rock walls rise to either side of the stream, cutting off light and magnifying all sounds. Narrow and fast, the water disappears into a small crack too narrow for a swimmer, pouring over the cliff edge in a flurry of white spray and mist. One rocky wall of the stream channel provides just enough hand and footholds to allow a climber to reach the top.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Underground Spring
node.description: The force of the water flowing through the narrow crack is tremendous, pushing against everything in its path. There is virtually no light, but the walls seem to be formed of rough stone that scrapes roughly at anything that comes into contact with it.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Beneath the Prayer Gate
node.description: Patterns of light bloom within the glossy black stone of the prayer gate's walls. Etched in gold on one side, a wounded S'Kra Mur woman sings to a sleeping dragon, her tail held gently above her ankles. On the other side, the same woman holds a sleeping S'Kra Mur baby in her arms, her tail undulating in the air.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Peri'el Prayer Gate
node.description: A grove of white birch trees stands opposite the prayer gate dedicated to the Goddess Peri'el. Watching over the wild inner slopes to the south, a golden king snake perches atop the gate. Two guards, taking their duty very seriously, stand to either side of the gate watching those who approach.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Woodland Path
node.description: A narrow path winds between white birch trees and hemlocks as it climbs up the eastern slope. Although the streets are but a few steps down the hill, already a peaceful quiet envelops the area, perhaps a result of the trees sheltering the path from the activities below.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Woodland Path
node.description: Fluttering birch leaves and the flexible branchlets of the hemlocks ride the wind with every tug at the delicate silvery foliage. The earth remains perpetually damp here, and the sweet smell of forest earth rises with every footfall.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Woodland Path
node.description: The path slopes steeply up to the northeast, as it swings round a large storm-damaged hemlock. The damp soil makes for a slippery ascent, but the drooping branches of the tree work well for holding on.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Woodland Path
node.description: A tall hemlock forces the trail around it, as the footpath continues down to the west and the streets of Surlaenis below. Creeping cassiope borders the journey eastwards up the slope where the hemlocks outnumber the thinning birches. The quiet is remarkable -- except for the drip of moisture from tree twigs or rustle of some hidden creature -- the only sounds are those of your own voice and movements.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Woodland Path
node.description: Nothing is visible in any direction but the forest of evergreen hemlocks. The climb up the eastern slope takes some effort, and requires careful attention to descend safely back down towards the lake, but the frequent switchbacks minimize any need to literally clamber and scale.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Woodland Path
node.description: The footpath ends at a steep bank, and it will be necessary to climb over it to continue. Roots and shrubs cover the bank, so it is not difficult to scramble up. A hole in the hillside may likely house some small woodland creature, but there is no sign of its occupant.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Woodland Path
node.description: The descent to the west is down a steep bank, made manageable by relying on the bushes and roots growing upon it. The footpath continues to wind eastwardly up the slope. Three mossy rocks stacked purposefully to one side of the trail could be a marker, but there is no apparent explanation for their arrangement or position.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Woodland Path
node.description: A stone altar surrounded by a low hedge of young pruned hemlock trees borders the western edge of the path. Kneeling at the altar provides a view through a narrow gap in the forest, with a glimpse of the lake and temple steeple aligned in view. The path continues to descend down the slope to the southwest, and twines around the trees further upwards to the east.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Woodland Path
node.description: The thick tangle of hemlocks thins upon the approach to a clearing at the top of the path's rise. Within the clearing is a cluster of small buildings, although it is difficult to determine much about them from this point. Another very narrow trail threads its way over a fallen and rotting trunk straight north, but the encroaching trees quickly hide its destination.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Woodland Path
node.description: The path follows the steeply angled slant up over the rise of ground to the east. The area is cleared of trees to afford a view of the open sky, and the hemlocks of the surrounding forest ward a cluster of small buildings built atop the clearing. Behind them, a sheer cliff of earth rises to even greater heights, as the forest conjoins again to shield whatever might dwell among those palisades. The trail falls down to the southwest to disappear into those dark, silvery-needled trees.

node.name: Cleric Guild, Outside the Gate
node.description: The path ends abruptly at an elegant white iron gate at the entrance to the Cleric's Guild. Beyond the gate, three small buildings form the familiar Surlaenis U-shape surrounding the courtyard. Colorful tiger lilies grow on both sides of the entranceway.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Hemlock Forest
node.description: The ground holds puddles of water even in dry weather, where runoff has collected and stagnated. The hemlock needles float in the shallow, brackish water, hiding it until the gentle splash of a footfall reveals the soggy earth. The trees crowd close to the trail, allowing only a narrow passage through.

node.name: Cleric Guild, Outer Courtyard
node.description: A path composed of white gravel leads from the gate and encircles the entire courtyard. An enormous fountain made of marble and alabaster stands in the middle of the circular path, the constant sound of trickling water in the air. The three buildings that make up the Cleric Guild border three sides of the courtyard.

node.name: Cleric Guild, Innu's Quarters
node.description: The guild leader Innu's quarters are long and narrow, with a cot just visible at the back behind a heavy curtain. Her desk near the door is rather bare, except for a neat parchment and a cloth she uses for polishing weapons. The wall is hung with some nice examples of used weapons -- a broadsword, a heavy hammer, and a battered ebony crossbow.

node.name: Cleric Guild, Communal Room
node.description: Potted ferns stand in each corner of this main gathering place of the guild. The thin screen walls are delicately flecked with embedded gold paint. Elegant candle holders made from a highly polished brass sit on tables throughout the room, each one holding a lit candle. Pillows upon the floor allow some comfort from the hard ground.

node.name: Cleric Guild, Prayer Room
node.description: A black alabaster altar stands at the far end of the room, flanked on both sides by two exquisite candelabras almost as tall as a Human. Each candelabra holds five candles, their flickering light reflecting in the glossy surface of the altar. A few clerics sit by the altar, their heads bowed in silent prayer.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Hemlock Forest
node.description: Young saplings crowd the undergrowth of the forest and create a dense mesh of vegetation impenetrable except where the trail forces its way through. No animal, or even insect life, stirs about. The only sound is the lulling whisper of hemlock needles as the branches sway in gentle winds high overhead.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Hemlock Forest
node.description: A shallow ditch cuts across the path and runs along beside the trail a short distance until it plunges out of sight into the forest growth to the west. This gully, dug by rainfall and melting snows, channels its way to the lake below, and puddles remain on the saturated ground even in dry weather.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Hemlock Forest
node.description: In the shadow of the steep cliff rising to the north, the hemlocks grow close together, their branches entwined and woven in a matted mass of snarls. The sky is barely visible overhead and only a wan light penetrates to the needle-covered forest floor. The distant sound of tumbling rocks ricochets dully off the cliff face high overhead where something climbs, or falls.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Hemlock Forest
node.description: The narrow trail plunges on into the dense trees, weaving amongst the scented, drooping branches. The smaller trees show scars where the bark was stripped away, either by a gnawing animal, or cut and harvested for medicinal uses.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Bottom of Cliff
node.description: A cliff rises overhead as the northeastern slope of the island sweeps upwards at an impossible angle. The initial climb up is a mixture of earth and protruding rocks, but not far overhead is a broken face of red-veined dark stone. Hemlock trees crowd right to the base of the cliff, a few smaller specimens even encroaching up the lower reaches of the ascent.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: This ledge is just high enough to see over the hemlock forest below and beyond to the far side of the lake. Gusts of wind sweep across the tops of the trees, appearing for all the world like a sea of silvery green waves shifting and swelling. A thin ledge overhead is accessible by the protruding roots in the soil and cracks in the projecting rocks that may serve as handholds.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: This long thin ledge provides little room for movement. A flat rock juts out overhead and another ledge appears within reach below -- either option seems safer than lingering here. A scuttering sound scratches over the rocks as some unseen creature darts safely out of sight.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: A huge dark rock juts out from the cliff face and offers a comfortable resting point before continuing to climb. A clump of burr-weeds grows from a crevice and thrashes against the hard surface of the rock with a raspy whisper as the wind whips across the cliff.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: At the juncture of the rock and the cliff, long cracks mar the vertical face. Some of these cracks are almost wide enough to squeeze into, but the weather has created enough chinks to assist a climb up to another rocky perch above. A constant drip, drip comes from somewhere within the cracks.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, A High Perch
node.description: Deep vertical cracks, like gashed wounds, continue up and down the cliff face. This perch offers little protection from the wind and weather that can pound against the cliff wall. Bits of rock crumble and fall with each movement -- at this height, the climb is not one for the inexperienced. A rock shelf is visible even higher above.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: Barely a third of the way up the cliff, this shelf cut from the rock is wide enough to comfortably pause upon. Scraggly bushes, leafless with wooly stems, cling to every crack deep enough to hold a spoonful of sandy soil. A long horizontal crevice slices through the rock overhead, and appears to be deep enough to crawl inside.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: The crevice slants back deeply into the face of the cliff and cradles you safely within. Towards the back, an arched tunnel bores through the rock to the west. A few animal droppings and a tuft of fur caught on a burr-bush reveal other creatures have sought shelter here as well.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: The western side of the deep crevice ends abruptly. Any misstep and it's a long, long fall. A crumbling ledge above is the only way up -- otherwise, an arched tunnel leads back to the eastern side of the crevice and the alternative route down.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: Chunks of rock fall with every movement -- this ledge does not appear to be stable at all. Small spider webs glint within the fracturing stone, creating the illusion of silver threads tying the dark, disintegrating chunks of rock together. Above, a shallow crevice is an even darker stain upon the black rock.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: This shallow crevice offers minimal protection from the wind, and a view, with a hefty dose of vertigo, of the terrain below. Within the crevice, dark red veins streak the black rock, and gusts of wind blow gritty sand in little swirls. Above, you can see a round hole in the cliff face.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: This large hole is just one climb away from the top of the cliff. However, very few cracks in the rock are in the right places for holding on, and the wind is especially brisk and strong here. Some dirty straw tucked within one corner of the hole resembles an untidy nest.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Top of Cliff
node.description: At the top of the cliff, very little vegetation thrives. A few scraggly tree-like bushes, with short thick needles, rock in the strong wind gusts, and some grey blotches of lichen stain the dark red rocks. Jagged basalt boulders litter the top and rise further north in a second cliff, more perilous than the climb below.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff Trail
node.description: A trail snakes between the barren rocks -- here is a cold and lifeless terrain. The hiss of wind is constant, the stone hard underfoot. Grit and sand swirls over the landscape, scratching a forlorn plea in the lonely quiet.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff Trail
node.description: A lime-green creeping plant is startling in the barren soil and sand. Its tiny leaves stand out brightly against the dark ground. Except for this one patch of green, all else is dark and bare. The wind thrums along, a constant companion, day and night.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff Trail
node.description: Columnar basalt formations, octagonal in shape and in varying heights, rise off to the west. Arranged like giant steps, the phenomena has a comical appearance, but otherwise it is more rock in a place of rocks.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, High Cliffs
node.description: A pile of old bones lies at the base of the high cliffs. Clearly some animal has scavenged and picked them clean of any identifying features. A slanting ledge scales up the bluff, although the ascent looks treacherous. Care and skill are required to prevent the same fatal outcome as the poor creature whose remains are as cold and bare as this land.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, High Cliffs
node.description: The ledge slants steeply down to the west. Between the slope and the wind, merely staying in one place is difficult. A cantilevered ledge overhead, if reachable, appears to be a more practical spot to make decisions about the next stage of the journey.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, High Cliffs
node.description: Ice crystal needles fill the cracks in the surface of the ledge. Cold air sinks from above, yet the sudden chill is unexplainable. Although the wind gusts are freezing and the height considerable, the year 'round snow of the rim is still far, far above this point. Closer inspection proves the ice sprouts from within the rock, as the deeper fissures hold larger chunks of ice and frost.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, High Cliffs
node.description: A fine white frost covers all surfaces of the basalt, the red streaks in the rock taking on a pinkish cast beneath the filmy rime. Patterns splay over the surface like giant snowflakes as the strange ice grows in crystaline formations. A ledge, slippery with more ice, is visible even further up the cliff.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, High Cliffs Ledge
node.description: Icicles cling to the crags and fill the clefts in the cliff, with perhaps a single drop of water slowly sliding off to fall below. Tiny tundra-like mosses grow beneath the icicles' drip, blotching the ledge with yellow-green and red spores from the blooming plants. Once safely up to this point, one discovers a deep fracture running vertically through the rock. There does not appear to be any way to climb further up, so the choices at this point are either to descend or attempt to explore the fissure.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Daggers of ice drip from the top of a fissure and sparkle as the light beyond strikes the fragile surfaces. Inside the rock cavity, which drops sharply a few yards forward, the walls, floor and ceiling are all coated with a powdery rimefrost.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: This cave within the rock is freezing cold! Ice coats the jagged rock formations with refracting crystals, as if a coarse, heavy snow had blown through. Powdery slush sloshes underfoot, while a blast of even colder air blows in from around a bend to the northwest.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: The cave roof slopes down sharply to meet the ground to the northwest. In one cramped corner is a narrow slit leading further into the bowels of the rock, the opening crusted with broken fangs of ice.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Smooth ice veils the cave walls and floor, filling in the cracks and rounding the sharp edges of rock. An iron ladder affixed to the west wall is also coated in a film of ice and ascends into a dark passage above. Clumps of ice break from the ceiling above and hit the slick floor below with a loud *crack*.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: The walls of the cave are pocked with indentations, grooves and clefts. Frigid air seeps from them, and the moisture in the air snap freezes to dusty particles of ice. A faint tinkling must be the sound of that vapor solidifying and falling like glitter dust to the powder-coated floor.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Spears of ice as thick as a 'Tog's arm hang from chunks of rock overhead. All surfaces are permanently coated in the ice which has taken on a sickeningly bluish tint. A faint chemical smell, unidentifiable, but most certainly unpleasant, pervades the air.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: The journey into the rock ends here in a featureless tomb of smooth grey ice. No rock is visible at all, everything now slicked with the frozen glaze. Breath freezes instantly with each exhalation in a tiny explosion of icy sparks.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Frost-shattered rock, sprinkled with powdery white crystals, litters the floor. The walls are crumbling from the freeze and thaw of moisture that threads through the network of fractures. A steady melting of ice from within the rock slides down the frozen walls and trickles thinly down a slope deeper into the cavern. In patches, the rivulet has refrozen into ice slicks likely to send the unwary sliding into the dark below.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Water oozes down the slope of the cave's floor, most of it refrozen into an icy slide. A chuckle of water spilling over rock resounds through the air, but the source of it out of sight. The northern wall is a solid, smooth surface of dark red rock splattered with a craze of frost.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Enough water collected here at one time to cover the floor and has since frozen into a solid pool of ice. Smooth as a mirror, it reflects light with a sparkle. The icy pattern of frost creeps over the walls in a swirling design, but the bitter cold and pervasive dark beyond belies the beauty of ice and rock.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: A niche at the far end of the wall is filled with the powdery frost. Thin wires run over the opening like a web, and icicles dangle from the wires in a scalloped formation. A cold, cold wind gushes up from cracks in the floor making it difficult to get enough breath to speak.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis
node.description: A thin path winds its way from the top of the stairs through the grounds of the necropolis. The glossy black tile roof of a mausoleum is visible in the distance, though the weeping willow trees which line the path obstruct the view of most of the building. Freshly planted flowers grow in colorful profusion throughout the area.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis
node.description: Octagonal white bricks are fitted tightly together to form the path which leads from the top of the stairs to the main cemetery. A narrow trail covered with grey marble gravel branches off toward a nearby mausoleum. Meandering clusters of vibrant yellow tulips are planted alongside the path.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis
node.description: The white octagonal brick path winds through carefully tended flowerbeds toward the main cemetery. Nearby, weeping willows spread their branches protectively over a secluded sitting area, shading some benches and providing visitors respite from the elements. Though some of the bricks are broken, and moss grows between the cracks, the overall impression is one of peace.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis
node.description: To the northeast, the main gate of the cemetery is barely visible through a copse of dogwood trees. A peaceful calm permeates the area as a soft breeze gently floats through the trees. The lawns here are a deep plush green grass that is well tended and soft to the touch.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis
node.description: The white brick path stops at an ornate fence that encircles the necropolis. Made of black and white iron rods, the fence is broken by an elaborately wrought gate. Beyond the gate, the brick path spirals off deeper into the cemetery, winding amongst the headstones.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: Sweeping green lawns are well manicured and lovingly tended. Leading into the distance, graceful headstones sport combinations of delicately scrawled words, stone cherubs, symbols and gargoyles. The deep green of the grass contrasts with the light green of the ferns planted between some of the grave markers. The fragrance of the flowers left by loved ones mingles with that of the blooming dogwoods, while weeping willows shade the tombstones.

Sweeping green lawns are well manicured and lovingly tended. Leading into the distance, headstones cast shadows across the dark green grass. The fragrance of flowers drifts on the breeze, and weeping willows drape their branches over the tombstones.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The white brick path forks off towards the northeast and northwest beginning its complete circle around the necropolis. Several headstones lie alongside the path, including a heart-shaped one which attests to a couple who are joined in death as they were in life, while next to it, a tiny marker has been etched with the image of a smiling baby. The sweet fragrance of the fresh cut flowers which decorate the headstones fills the air.

The white brick path forks off towards the northeast and northwest to encircle the necropolis. Several headstones lie alongside the path, including a heart-shaped one which attests to a couple who are joined in death as they were in life, while next to it, a tiny marker has been etched with the image of a smiling baby. The flowers that decorated the headstones are faded and rotting with a dark smeared slime.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The path curves southeast toward the entrance to the necropolis. A break in the oak and willow trees along the walk provides a view of the mausoleum's black tile roof towards the southwest. The grass is lush and green, with rows of headstones marking the final homes of the island's residents.

The path curves southeast toward the entrance to the necropolis. The black tile roof of a mausoleum stands silhouetted in a gap in the trees along the walk. The grass between the rows of headstones is dark and slick with wetness.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The path continues its way around the necropolis, weaving through row after row of marble headstones. The sound of a brook beyond some nearby oak trees breaks the peaceful quiet, and a bed of flowers provides a splash of vibrant color against the deep green lawn.

The path continues its way around the necropolis, weaving through row after row of marble headstones. A brook gurgles in the darkness, and the overly sweet smell of flowers mingles with a scent of decay.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The deep green lawn is well cared for, the grass thick and lush underfoot. Modest grey slate markers adorn most of the graves, but a few ostentatious gilt-trimmed white alabaster monuments are scattered here and there. Weeping willows stand over the path, their long branches blowing in a soft breeze.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The bridge over the small pond is visible in the distance as the white brick path wends its way through the necropolis. A freshly dug hole awaits yet another islander who has recently crossed over to the starry road.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: At a bend in the path, a square tomb stands shaded by a young willow tree. The stone is dusty and stained with watermarks forlornly patterned like tear drops spilled upon it. The tree branches scrape against it in the wind, neither a screech nor a sigh, but the sound is unsettling.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: Headstones run in neat rows, the dates in the inscriptions indicating that those who rest here are among the most recent arrivals in the necropolis. Neat rectangles of bare dirt covered by wilting flowers mark the newly interred, their headstones lying beside the grave awaiting the mason and his helpers to set them into place.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: A gentle breeze is the only discernible movement in this quiet part of the cemetery. Soft grass blankets the ground around the older headstones of those buried long ago. The graves are aged, but still very well maintained. The scent of honeysuckle from the nearby vines fills the air.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: A shovel and pickaxe lie tumbled upon the grass at the edge of a half-dug grave. Fresh flowers, their petals scattered by careless feet, sprawl amidst the broken ruins of clay pots. Nearby, a chisel is half-buried in the soft earth beneath an overturned headstone.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: Two sprawling weeping willow trees loom over the path like sentinels on watch. Nearby, flowers are placed at the foot of a freshly dug grave, the dirt packed back in to cover the occupant of the hole. Granite headstones, aligned in evenly spaced rows, cast shadows across the lawn.

Two sprawling weeping willow trees loom over the path like sentinels on watch. Dirt piles border a freshly dug grave only partially filled with dirt. Granite headstones, aligned in evenly spaced rows, cast shadows across the lawn.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The sound of trickling water comes from a nearby marble fountain surrounded by a bed of delicate white daisies. Some of the daisies have fallen victim to mourners that have picked them to place at the grave of their loved ones.
The sound of trickling water comes from a nearby marble fountain surrounded by a bed of daisies. Some of the daisies are trampled and uprooted, and the earth scratched and furrowed.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: Torches line the brick path winding its way through the neatly tended headstones. A mound of dirt lies next to the beginnings of a freshly-made hole, soon to be a tomb to house yet another resident.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The sorrowful song of the mourning dove drifts over the picturesque greenery. Neat paths wind their way through the lawns, while benches are tucked discreetly beneath sheltering trees. A marbled-granite gargoyle rests gently upon a large slab of granite marking the remains of one of the islanders.

The call of a night bird erupts in the distance. Paths wind through the lawns, and benches lurk beneath veiling trees. A marbled-granite gargoyle rests gently upon a large slab of granite marking the remains of one of the islanders.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: Grass overgrows sections of the path as it winds deeper through the necropolis. Some of the headstones are hundreds of years old and worn from the water and freezing rains of passing generations. Not a single inscription upon them is readable.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The lawn abounds with weeds that even cover some of the tombstones beneath their tangling growth. The branches of surrounding willow trees meet the tall, unmown grass in a clumsy bow.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: Weeping willows, planted long ago, now stand tall, their outstretched branches allowing little view of the skies above. The headstones, thickly clustered along this part of the necropolis, are cracked from age and neglect.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The willow trees thin out a bit, enough to allow a glimpse of the sky above. Thickly growing grass, of several different varieties to judge by the variations in color and texture, carpets the ground around you, broken only by tiny purple-tipped white flowers. Moss-covered headstones, some cracked and broken, line the area -- one of them a massive monument, large enough to mark the grave of an entire family.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: Beneath the branches of a gnarled oak tree, a long wooden bench provides a place to meditate, or just to rest. The whiteness of the path is broken by low growing weeds and moss which peek through crevices between the octagonal bricks. Once carefully tended, wildflowers now grow amidst the unpruned rose bushes in a nearby flower bed, the blossoms filling the air with a fresh, sweet scent.

A gnarled oak shadows a long wooden bench. The silhouettes of thorny rose bushes and the pattern of weeds growing between the cracks in the path create a sharp contrast of pale and dark. Sounds of distant voices carry on the wind, but there is no clue as to where these indistinct sounds originate.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: Across the necropolis, sunlight glints off the surface of the pond, visible between the trees which shade the white brick path. Low headstones cluster closely amidst the overgrown grass, covered with a thin layer of moss and worn by time and weather.

Across the necropolis, moonlight glints off the surface of the pond, visible between the trees which shade the white brick path. Low headstones cluster closely amidst the overgrown grass, covered with a thin layer of moss and worn by time and weather.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: A soft breeze rustles the leaves of the trees, breaking the stillness. One lone headstone stands underneath a willow tree, crudely chiseled into a half-circle, its surface smoothed over by years of exposure to the elements.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: Against a canvas of green grass, a tall, elegant vase of exotic lilies leans against a simple headstone. A small patch of grass is matted to the ground where someone had been kneeling. The subtle scent of the lilies dances in the air of a soft breeze.
A tall vase of lilies lies knocked on its side near a simple headstone. The grass is uprooted and marred with long scratch marks, but the subtle scent of lilies dances in the air of a soft breeze.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The path winds through a copse of slender birch trees, the mottled white bark a pallid contrast to the deep green grass of the lawn. A couple of wrens perch amidst the leaves of the tree, their heads tilted slightly as they survey passers-by with a watchful eye.

The path winds through a copse of slender birch trees, the mottled white bark a pallid contrast to the dark grass. The trees tremble and shudder with every gust of breeze, their leaves and twigs in a dancing frenzy.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The once-neat lawn is overgrown with dandelions and other weeds in the far corner of the burial grounds. Thin headstones of dark grey slate are canted at odd angles, half-hidden amidst the greenery. Several markers near the base of a gnarled oak tree have toppled, pushed over by the gradual yet insistent pressure of its roots.

Dandelions and scraggly weeds claim the lawn here in the farthest corner of the grounds. Thin headstones of dark grey slate are canted at severe angles, nearly hidden in the ragged greenery. Several markers near the base of an oak tree lie toppled, with moist scars of earth at their bases.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: Weeds sprout throughout the lawn, yet the bricked path is surprisingly free of growth. Few headstones survive here, and the ones which do, are worn by the weather or cracked and broken by vandals... or worse.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The soil is rocky and coarse, and what grass there is, is thin and scraggly. The path begins to slope downward to the south, heading towards the main entrance.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: A dirt trail ends here where it meets the bricked path, with the paved path leading back into the trees to the north. Down the slope, the trail winds towards the grounds' pond and gate. The grassless soil is hard and rocky -- too hard for digging graves. With little to break the view, the eastern slope of the island, blanketed with a dark evergreen forest, rises abruptly towards the heights of the island's rim.

A dirt trail ends here where it meets the bricked path, with the paved path leading back into the trees to the north. Down the slope, the trail winds towards the grounds' pond and gate. The grassless soil is hard and rocky, but broken by scratches and furrows dug into the ungiving ground. The dark forested eastern slope rises as a backdrop against this treeless section of the necropolis.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The trail climbs the slope, and is steep enough here to be slippery in wet weather and slick with dust and grit on dry days. A single clump of weeds grows around a large boulder, the only landmark nearby.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: At the base of a hill, a dirt path climbs upwards to another section of the grounds. The white octagonal tiles of the paved walk, here dulled to a dingy shade of grey from the eroded soil of the barren hillside, carry the path on to the southwest. A gap in the bordering trees provides a glimpse of the lavish lawns and rows of headstones plentiful below.

At the base of a hill, a dirt path climbs upwards to another section of the grounds. The white octagonal tiles of the paved walk, here dulled to a dingy shade of grey from the eroded soil of the barren hillside, carry the path on to the southwest. The bordering trees creak and sway in the darkness as some unseen animal forages and stirs beneath the concealing shadows.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: The lawn is covered by a deep green carpet of grass, virtually untouched by any worker's spade. A few headstones are scattered here and there, marking the graves of recently deceased islanders, but for the most part, this area remains unpopulated.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Final Resting Place
node.description: An onyx tombstone, carved with a panther and trimmed with polished gold leaf, attests to the riches acquired by the mage buried here. The panther crouches, ready to attack anyone who might disturb its master's eternal rest.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Outside the Mausoleum
node.description: The trail leads up to the entrance of the mausoleum. Highly polished white marble columns on either side of the entrance support a small overhang that shades the doorway. A glossy black tile roof protects the occupants from the elements, completing the simple elegance of the structure.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Mausoleum Grand Foyer
node.description: Polished floors made from black marble reflect the light emanating from several candles placed in tall brass candelabras. Two divans rest against the far wall underneath a large painting of the inner lake. An arched doorway made of carved oak leads into the gela oleni, or the main burial chambers.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Gela Oleni
node.description: Walls of black marble shine with such a high gloss, reflections are seen with almost crystal clarity. Images of flowers are etched into portions of the marble, and grooves are cut at evenly spaced intervals, outlining each individual resting place. Each grave is a large two foot square, just enough room to hold the urn of a resident. A door, made from the same marble as the walls, stands slightly ajar.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a Mausoleum, Behind the Door
node.description: The only thing visible in the dark is a staircase that leads down to the cellar of the mausoleum. Faint sounds echo below, disturbing the silence with restless tones and thumps.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a Mausoleum, Crematorium
node.description: The room is dark and windowless. The only means of light is one lone candle that flickers in the far corner. A large steel oven, its doors slightly ajar, takes up almost all of the floor space. A faint smell of something indistinguishable fills the air, unpleasant to the nose. An occasional bumping sound appears to come from the general direction of the far wall.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Tunnels
node.description: The tunnels branch off into several directions, leading deeper into the unknown. Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the marble wall that leads back out towards the cellar. Indistinguishable sounds echo throughout the darkness, coming from all directions.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Tunnels
node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Tunnels
node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Tunnels
node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Tunnels
node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Tunnels
node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.
