node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Tunnels
node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Necropolis Tunnels
node.description: Ancient S'Kra symbols are carved into the tunnel walls in a continuous line, their meaning indecipherable to the common eye. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern that casts just enough light to make traveling through the tunnels easier.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Beneath the Prayer Gate
node.description: Smooth mother-of-pearl walls rise to form a gentle arch above. Mosaics of interlocking shells form images of life beneath Elanthia's oceans. Blue-grey dolphins frolic among sea-green waves as gentle merfolk herd schools of fish into nets of woven kelp. To the east, the Staho Pivo'hrr'schu'Mus leads into the city proper.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Eluned Prayer Gate
node.description: Gentle terraces of tilled earth rise to the west, leading towards the Selhin Dava. A large prayer gate, watched over by two guards, stands as the only demarcation between the inner slope and the city. Dedicated to Eluned of the Waters, the prayer gate bears an anloral sculpture of a leaping dolphin at its peak.

node.name: The Slings and Arrows of Outrageous Fortune
node.description: Roomier within than it appears from the outside, colorful braided wool rugs cover the dirt floor of this tiny burrow. A bent-twig stool, held together by horsehair strands, provides seating for the young Halfling man carving bowstaves behind the split birch log which serves as a counter. Woven reed baskets hold an assortment of slings, while wooden barrels store staff slings and bowstaves for customers to peruse.

node.name: Fang Cove, Fate's Fortune Lane
node.description: A towering marble archway opens a gap in the wall to the north and separates the ongoing construction and somewhat more refined completed structures of Fate's Fortune Lane from the crude structures and makeshift walkway along the beach. The entrance to a squat, wide bungalow sits in opposition to the arch, and the sheltering cliffs of Fang's Peak rise up from behind it. To either side of the arch, cobblestones of different shapes and sizes have been laid out to form the wide Fate's Fortune Lane.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Inn Stables
node.description: A green swath of grass, neatly clipped, forms a small lawn in front of a compact but clean and well-kept stable tucked beside the Inn. The path back to the street is hard-packed dirt sprinkled with clean straw, and lined along each edge with a row of grey cobblestones.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Inn Stables
node.description: Huge skylights cut in the tiled roof reflect the light from several lanterns hanging from the rafters, softly illuminating the quiet rows of wooden stalls. A few stable boys are still about, ready to tend the horses of late-coming guests, and their conversation mingles with the soft sounds of sleepy horses stamping the straw-covered earthen floor.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Courtyard
node.description: Carved driftwood benches cluster around the huge bole of an ancient tree, its thick overhead branches and broad leaves deflecting rain and weather. A crushed-shell pathway encircles the trunk and leads up to a grand doorway at the far end of the courtyard, sheltered by a generously overhanging blue-tiled roof. The substantial exterior beams supporting the roof are carved with mingled Elothean and Elven script so that the effect is more of pattern and shape than discernible words.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Entry Hall
node.note: Inn of the Crystal Wave|Crystal Wave
node.description: The ceiling soars high overhead, a puzzle of crossing and joined beams, brightly illuminated by glass and polished brass lanterns hung at regular intervals. The floor is crystalline-etched in swirling patterns that give the impression of sea foam. Low planters divide small conversation nooks filled with couches and soft padded chairs. A glass door to the rear leads to a garden area.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Hallway
node.description: Mats of woven fresh tules besparkled with tiny shells along the outer edges lead down a broad hallway. An abstract etching of a soaring albatross done in pale pastels hangs on the wall.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Hallway
node.description: Mats of woven fresh tules besparkled with tiny shells along the outer edges lead down a broad hallway. An abstract etching of a crab done in pale pastels hangs on the wall.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Hallway
node.description: Mats of woven fresh tules besparkled with tiny shells along the outer edges lead down a broad hallway. An abstract etching of a sea turtle done in pale pastels hangs on the wall.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Hallway
node.description: Mats of woven fresh tules besparkled with tiny shells along the outer edges lead down a broad hallway. An abstract etching of an intricate coral fan done in pale pastels hangs on the wall.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Hallway
node.description: Mats of woven fresh tules besparkled with tiny shells along the outer edges lead down a broad hallway. An abstract etching of a sun-bleached piece of driftwood done in pale pastels hangs on the wall.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Hallway
node.description: Mats of woven fresh tules besparkled with tiny shells along the outer edges lead down a broad hallway, ending at a large window looking out on a view of Lake Chawalkas not far away. The north wall of the hallway is formed by a graceful silverwillow balcony overlooking the entry hall below. To the other side, an abstract etching of an octopus done in pale pastels hangs on the wall.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Partaking Garden
node.note: Inn of the Crystal Wave|Crystal Wave
node.description: A broad patio of grey flagstones spans almost the entire rear of the inn, covered by a glazed lattice that allows a view of the night sky. Glass-topped tables are scattered among young silver plum trees sparkling with tiny lights, a few in private corners, and the scent of blooming flowers from the lawn beyond scents the air. In the distance, bright streaks on the water reveal where night boaters on Lake Chawalkas pursue their business, or their romances.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Garden of the Senses
node.description: Water trickles down a large stack of randomly fallen boulders, creating tiny and large waterfalls and a constant peaceful background for quiet conversation. Crystal goblets have been placed nearby, allowing visitors to enjoy the icy cold water. Fragrant k'dira bushes, blooming roses, and lyrandia vines planted in clumps perfume the air and delight the eyes. Copperwood benches have been carved and polished into intricate shapes that invite fingers to explore.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Serenity Garden
node.description: A high, plain wooden fence surrounds the area, cutting off sounds and distractions and leaving only a sense of peace. At its base, low evergreen shrubs have been trimmed into a uniform hedge. A crushed white shell pathway encircles the garden, with four benches placed at spaced intervals. In the center is a large, wind-cut boulder, covered in green lichen on its north side, and surrounded by raked sand.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Dance Floor
node.description: The flagstones have been polished and waxed to a mirror finish, providing a smooth surface underfoot for dancing. The fragrance of the garden flowers and the soft strains of music from somewhere nearby create an intimate atmosphere for a romantic tete-a-tete.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Private Corner
node.description: Screened from the rest of the garden by planters and small plum trees, this table provides an intimate, private place to enjoy the fine food and drink of the Inn, or just to sit and talk. The faint background noise of silver chinking on china mingles with the soft sounds of the city at rest for the night.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Hallway
node.description: Mats of woven fresh tules besparkled with tiny shells along the outer edges lead down a broad hallway. An abstract etching of a nautilus shell done in pale pastels hangs on the wall.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Guestroom
node.description: The room is dark and restful, quiet and peaceful. A soft night-blue wool blanket covers the wide sleeping mat and the wall screens are thick oiled blue paper. On a low black-lacquered table surrounded by dark velvet seating cushions, an anlas candle burns quietly, shedding a warm golden light over everything.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Guestroom
node.description: The wall screens depict crashing waves with flecks of sparkling foam under pale blue sunshine-filled skies. Silken coverlets and pillows in silvery blue embroidered with milky thread are piled upon the sleeping mat. Plump cushions provide comfortable seating for intimate conversations.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Hallway
node.description: Mats of woven fresh tules besparkled with tiny shells along the outer edges lead down a broad hallway. An abstract etching of a prowling shark done in pale pastels hangs on the wall.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Guestroom
node.description: Warm light spills from glass-enclosed lamps scattered about the room, picking up golden highlights in the polished plank floor. A sleeping mat covered with plump stuffed white comforters is in one corner, next to twin overstuffed low armchairs covered in a patterned fabric of forest greens and browns. Fresh flowers in a jade vase on a small table perfume the air with a heady floral aroma.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Guestroom
node.description: Mirrored lanterns in the shape of stars twinkle along the walls and sparkle with warm light. Pale flowered silk coverlets rest upon the sleeping mat, and on the sideboard is a porcelain vase filled with a profusion of amber sweetpeas and baby's breath. Thick lamb's wool rugs add even more softness to the inviting coziness.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Hallway
node.description: Mats of woven fresh tules besparkled with tiny shells along the outer edges lead down a broad hallway. An abstract etching of a leaping dolphin done in pale pastels hangs on the wall.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Guestroom
node.description: A brazier of glowing coals sparkles near the outer wall, filling the room with both warmth and light. The sleeping mat covers are richly embroidered with swirling flames in golden and copper threads, and a painting of a smoldering mountain hangs above a squat black table and its seating cushions.

node.name: Inn of the Crystal Wave, Guestroom
node.description: Bare copperwood floors, polished to a satin sheen, have been covered with woven reed mats. The ceiling and walls are white, and square beams run overhead from one side of the room to the other. A line of twisted wooden posts half-separates the sleeping alcove from a sitting area containing several cushions and a low wooden table with an anlas candle on it. The bed is wide and low to the ground, covered with a quilted unbleached linen blanket.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, A Courtyard
node.description: The sandy courtyard, usually raked in neat geometric patterns, has a large white boulder in its center instead of the traditional fountain or sculpture. Slabs of rock, raised a handspan or so above the sand, are smooth and flat -- rather nice spots to rest upon.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highland Garden
node.description: Woven willow fences the small garden scratched from the hard rocky ground. Tucked up against the cliffs rising to the south, the garden receives less than ideal light, but still manages to survive and even thrive, with care from all who live here.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cave Mouth
node.description: The floor of the cave slopes gently upwards to meet the scooped out walls of the cliff. A semi-circle of burrow doors reveals this to be a dwelling place of people who apparently feel more safety living within the friable rock than in the path of the pieces that fall from it.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Highlands Tower
node.description: The only light comes from the arched entrance where once a door must have hung. The edges of the stones are crumbling into the same shale-like rock of the cliffs, but the floor is smooth clean white stone. Spiraling up through the ceiling, a narrow stairway has been carved into the curving wall. A hiss of dry grass, or wind through cracks in stone, softly sounds in the quiet.

node.name: Highlands Tower, Second Floor
node.description: Narrow window slits admit some light, but the round room still seems airless and still. The floor is curiously bare of the bits of twigs and other nest-building materials that tend to accumulate in abandoned buildings. A stone staircase leads back down, and a rusted metal staircase continues the climb upward.

node.name: Highlands Tower, Third Floor Antechamber
node.description: Small and windowless, the landing at the top of the stairs is bare of any furniture. A massive wooden door as thick as a Gor'Tog's hand is wide stands open, the heavy cross bar on its outside now against the wall instead of shot home in the wide iron clasp on the jamb. Oddly, the bar's location would mean it was used not to keep out intruders, but to contain whoever or whatever was in the room beyond.

node.name: Highlands Tower, Chamber
node.description: Shreds of ancient luxury still cling to the room, giving hints of the grandeur it must once have contained. A large four-poster bed stands forlornly, missing its mattress and with only shreds of lace-trimmed pink silk to show where the canopy once hung. The single window looks out not over the cliffs and what would be a spectacular view of the city, but toward the hillside rising up to the south, creating a curiously closed-in feeling. An iron hook has been sunk into the stone wall next to the window.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Meadowlands
node.description: The shoulders of the hillside shelter a group of cottages secluded in a grove of crabapple trees and willowy shrubs. Above, the path skirts a terrace of meadowlands and fields. A small communal garden fenced by bent willow grows on a flattened area a little farther down the hill.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Garden
node.description: A bent willow fence surrounds the garden to keep out trampling sheep. A pile of stones cleared from the area forms the beginning of a permanent wall along the northern edge. The soil is rich and deeply plowed, and the flowers and vegetables well-tended in their seasons.

node.name: Rummeltum's Catering
node.description: Baskets filled with fresh-baked bread and rolls are piled high beside the counter, and the aroma of roasting meats and pastries fills the air. The shop bustles with young Halflings carrying food from the stone bakehouse behind the store, or returning empty baskets and platters to be refilled. A leather-bound menu lies atop the counter, listing the goods offered for sale.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Landing Field
node.description: The grasses of this wide clearing have been pressed flat under the weight of reiterant traffic. Various stakes and anchors are installed near the center of the field, while little blue flags are set at even intervals around it to delineate its functional borders.

node.name: Foundry Commons, Oak Grove
node.description: Several towering oaks cast their shade on a narrow avenue of widely spaced shale flagstones wandering down the hill to a cluster of foundry chimneys. Standing under the trees to one side are three large grindstones -- one worn, another new -- spaced apart to provide solitary workspaces. A well-trampled path leads through the trees opposite towards three rough wooden structures squatting under the last shade at the edge of the grove. Across the hillside, a short hike away, is a small gazebo.

node.name: A Small Gazebo
node.description: The maple flooring has been freshly varnished, reflecting the brilliant white of the intricate railing. The grassy hill slopes down to a lake which ripples and shimmers, sparkling in the sunlight like an amethyst. Nearer to hand, a small path leads out of a grove of magnificent oak trees higher up the hill down to three hulking foundry buildings.

node.name: Foundry Commons
node.description: Obscuring a lake shimmering in the distance are large stone chimneys growing out of three small foundry buildings crafted one of granite, another of brick, and a third of plain grey stone. Adjacent to the foundries stands a ramshackle wooden shed. Further up the hill, a grove of huge oak trees provides a welcoming shade from the sun not far from a small gazebo.

A lake shimmers in the distance, obscured by tall sooty stone chimneys attached, one each, to three squat foundry buildings crafted one of granite, another of brick, and a third of plain grey stone. Bright sparks rise from the stacks and fade like fireflies against the blue-black night sky. A ramshackle wooden shed leans crookedly at the end of the row. Further up the hill, not far from a small gazebo, a grove of ancient oaks whispers secrets to the darkness in a soft leafy voice.

node.name: Foundry Building
node.description: Hot grey stone walls seem to huddle in towards the fire in the small chamber of the foundry. Hanging over the fire from a thick beam is an enormous crucible occupying a lion's share of the less than ample space. The rest of the room is crowded with an old, but well-maintained bellows aimed into the glowing coals and a bin of charcoal.

node.name: The Supply Shed
node.description: The interior of the shed is remarkably clean and orderly. Ingots, ores, and tools are stacked, binned, and hung in neat arrays. A fastidious-looking Dwarf hovers about the materials, constantly rearranging, straightening, and dusting the inventory.

node.name: Edge of the Oak Grove
node.description: Three shelters stand at the edge of the grove of towering oaks, providing protection from the elements to those working at the forges within. The swell of the hill to one side and the thick grove to other allows for view of little but the sky.

node.name: The Smithy
node.description: As opposed to the bright red exterior, the interior walls are of bare wooden planks. The heat emanating from a bed of glowing coals in the firepit of a large stone forge bites in the nostrils and lungs overpowering the scent of fresh-cut wood which would otherwise pervade the room. Between the forge and the water bucket a heavy double-horned anvil sits upon a large slice of tree trunk. Racks of hammers, tongs, files, and anvil hardies line the walls and the edge of the stone forge.

node.name: The Smithy
node.description: A bed of coals glows redly in a stone forge against the back wall, a crude hood and chimney funneling smoke out of the small building. Sitting atop a thick slice of oaken tree trunk is a well-worn anvil of huge size. Pegs on the walls hold tongs, hammers, and anvil attachments of assorted sizes. Near the door sits a heavy mandrel, gathering dust.

node.name: The Smithy
node.description: Loosely fitted, weathered planks form the walls of the small structure, providing protection from rain and sun but allowing some wind to seep through to relieve the heat. A stone forge squats in the rear of the shelter supporting a glowing bed of coals. Turning from the forge one finds a heavy anvil supported on a pyramid of oak.

node.name: Foundry Building
node.description: Thick granite blocks form a wide circular chamber with space for several people to work in the dry heat. The large single room of the foundry is occupied by an intense fire burning under a huge suspended crucible. An equally large bellows vents into the coals to produce more intense heat. A bin of black coal stands near the exit.

node.name: Foundry Building
node.description: The brick walls are dry and hot from a fire which heats the cramped quarters like an oven. An enormous iron lever holds a large crucible suspended from chains at one end. Poking into a vent in the stone beneath the fire is a large, weighted bellows, its bulk hiding a pile of coal in the shadows by the wall.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Entry and Maker's Mark Sales
node.description: High windows are set within the sturdy stone walls just below the vaulted ceilings, each window equiped with louvered vents to help improve the airflow within the working areas. The walls display some of the many metallic products produced within the workshops, while a few employees bustle about on errands for craftspeople. The noises of the forges, smithies, and foundries drown out the sounds of the city, making it difficult for anyone to carry on a conversation.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Southern Hallway
node.description: High walls meet overhead in an arched roof made from pale woods. The sounds and smells of metalworking drift down the hallway from the workshop rooms to the south. Nothing adorns the walls which are fashioned from large polished blocks set within pale mortar.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Southern Forge
node.description: Arched openings are set into the thick outer stone walls, with the majority of the furnaces set outside the building in an attempt to keep the temperature lower. Bellows set near the openings allow for air to be forced into the fire as needed. Bins hold supplies for the working craftspeople.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Southern Foundry
node.description: Set into the floor in the center of the room is a brick-lined firepit in which a fire burns white-hot. All the necessary tools are nearby, set within easy reach of the firepit for the convenience of the craftspeople who use this area. The room is somewhat hazy from the everpresent ash and soot created from the metallurgical processes.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Southern Smithy
node.description: Set against the outer wall, a small forge allows for the heating of unfinished projects before they are worked on the anvils or other equipment situated around the room. Large windows set within the thick stone walls help to circulate the air, in a vain attempt to keep the temperature comfortable.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, A Private Forge
node.description: Thick walls struggle to contain the blistering heat of the workshop where the fires blaze endlessly night and day. The flickering flames give a reddish glow to the racks and shelves of tools and equipment, all neatly placed and ready for use. Workers enter in their protective gear from time to time, checking the equipment and reporting back to a sentry at the entry.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Supplies
node.description: Supplies for the craftspeople are sorted into bins and containers that line the walls, each labeled with a neatly-lettered notice detailing the properties of the various materials. The sounds of the working areas drift into the room, muffled by the thick stone walls.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Bulk Materials
node.description: Offering a respite from the sweltering heat of the forges within, this thatch-covered area provides a service area for deliveries of goods and supplies used by the society's craftsmen. Crates of tools, metals and more are stacked from floor to ceiling, often at precarious angles that leave the clerks below nervously glancing up from time to time. Adjacent alleyways of the nearby Rinko neighborhood are within view.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Book Store
node.description: Bound instructions and manuals are stacked on shelves, neatly arranged for purchase. Employees dart in and out in the course of their duties, staying busy while they assist the craftspeople in their crafts.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Tool Store
node.description: Bins and shelves display the tools available for purchase, all of them covered with the thin layer of soot and ash that seems to permeate the whole building. The walls are thick stone and somewhat muffle the din of the workshops enclosed within the large edifice.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Northern Hallway
node.description: Narrow clerestory windows allow a little light into the long corridor that stretches towards some of the working areas of the building. The walls are polished stone, with pale mortar between the blocks creating a contrast with the dark gleaming surfaces. The acrid smell of molten metal mixes with the underlying smells of soot and fire.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Northern Smithy
node.description: Set against the outer wall, a small forge allows for the heating of unfinished projects before they are worked on the anvils or other equipment situated around the room. Large windows set within the thick stone walls help to circulate the air, in a vain attempt to keep the temperature comfortable.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Northern Foundry
node.description: Set into the floor in the center of the room is a brick-lined firepit in which a fire burns white-hot. All the necessary tools are nearby, set within easy reach of the firepit for the convenience of the craftspeople who use this area. The room is somewhat hazy from the everpresent ash and soot created from the metallurgical processes.

node.name: Aesry Forging Society, Northern Forge
node.description: Arched openings are set into the thick outer stone walls, with the majority of the furnaces set outside the building in an attempt to keep the temperature lower. Bellows set near the openings allow for air to be forced into the fire as needed. Bins hold supplies for the working craftspeople.

node.name: Aesry Enchanting Society, Supply Store
node.description: Plain plastered walls hold up the wooden shelves and racks that hold the supplies on offer to craftspeople. A young S'Kra Mur attendant bustles about, moving between the surfaces as they attend to customers.

node.name: Aesry Enchanting Society, Tool Outlet
node.description: A multitude of wooden crates and boxes fill the racks that hold all manner of supplies available to those visiting the society. Clerks bustle back and forth filling orders and restocking items.

node.name: Aesry Enchanting Society, Bookstore
node.description: Tall wooden bookshelves overflowing with a variety of old and new tomes and scrolls surround the room. A short assistant pores over several of the selections, while a cloaked S'Kra Mur attendant tends to the needs of visiting artisans.

node.name: Aesry Enchanting Society, Corridor
node.description: Plastered walls line this utilitarian space that allows access to the workrooms beyond. Brass chandeliers dangle overhead from the roughly cut wooden beams.

node.name: Aesry Enchanting Society, Green Workroom
node.description: The deep green of the walls is offset by the pale hues of the baseboards, while overhead is a coffered ceiling painted a pure white. Blown glass globes overhead enclose gaethzen spheres providing illumination for enchanters to work their craft.

node.name: Aesry Enchanting Society, Yellow Workroom
node.description: The rich yellow of the walls is offset by the pale hues of the baseboards, while overhead is a coffered ceiling painted a pure white. Blown glass globes overhead enclose gaethzen spheres providing illumination for enchanters to work their craft.

node.name: Aesry Enchanting Society, Society Master's Office
node.description: A solitary mat lies on the floor in front of a small table piled with papers and writing instruments. The plain plastered walls and polished wood of the floor have an elegant simplicity that keeps distractions to a minimum.

node.name: Aesry Enchanting Society, Red Workroom
node.description: The deep red of the walls is offset by the pale hues of the baseboards, while overhead is a coffered ceiling painted a pure white. Blown glass globes overhead enclose gaethzen spheres providing illumination for enchanters to work their craft.

node.name: Aesry Enchanting Society, Blue Workroom
node.description: The deep blue of the walls is offset by the pale hues of the baseboards, while overhead is a coffered ceiling painted a pure white. Blown glass globes overhead enclose gaethzen spheres providing illumination for enchanters to work their craft.

node.name: Aesry Enchanting Society, A Private Enchanting Room
node.description: Pieced together by a seemingly blind worker, the walls are covered with scraps of rugs, blankets, and carpets in a kaleidoscope of colors. A burly, light pink feldspar table is stashed in a corner of the room, providing plenty of room to work.

node.name: First Bank of Ilithi, Exchange Vault
node.description: Leather-clad guards stand at attention on each side of the polished blue marble arch which frames the moongate. Behind them, out of reach of the portal, a slender fair-haired Elothean woman reclines on a comfortable high-backed chair. Her richly embroidered scarlet silk robes almost conceal the gilded chains which fasten her ankles to iron rings in the floor. A steady stream of bank employees and favored customers enter and exit the vault all day to process transactions with other banks.
